|actor = }}'''Althea's husband''' (also known as '''Pop-Pop''') was the father of [[Judy Geller]], [[Aunt Lillian|Lillian]] and [[Aunt Phylis|Phylis]] as well as the maternal grandfather of [[Ross Geller|Ross]] and [[Monica Geller]]. ==Appearances== *"[[The One With The Sonogram At The End]]" (First mentioned) *"[[The One Where Nana Dies Twice]]" (Mentioned only) *"[[The One With The Princess Leia Fantasy]]" (Mentioned only) [[Category:Friends Characters]] [[Category:Unseen Characters]] [[Category:Males]] [[Category:Ross & Monica's Family]] [[Category:Deceased Characters]] [[Category:Fathers]] [[Category:Grandfathers]] [[Category:Characters]]
